MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G65 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Balmalloch Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:56am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30am on Wednesday, 31 March 2021
